about_the_game:
Welcome Contestant

Guns, Permadeath, Horror
GunpunkVR is a randomized, roguelike, horror shooter for VR Players wanting to test their skills in a terror inducing dungeon. Blast your way through the enemy, earn credits, and use them to buy elemental upgrades at the shop.

Can you survive long enough to face the boss of the dungeon? Or will you hesitate and fail?

Your skills with a gun aren't the only thing being tested. GunpunkVR taps into a pixel aesthetic to immerse you into the horror of the retro era. There are horrors within waiting to test your heart too... Are you brave enough? Are you ready?

Main Features
+A Single Dungeon with randomly selected rooms, monsters, and obstacles
+A Cast of enemies to kill and be killed by
+A Selection of weapons to pick before you enter the Dungeon
+Upgrades to purchase and attach to you gun during a run

Feedback
Feedback is the Lifeblood of Game Development.
Want to help find bugs, balance the gameplay, and improve the overall experience? Drop by the forums and join our community

"Entertainment is Everything"
-The Director

name: Gunpunk VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window10
  • Processor: Intel i5-8400 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR: Only supports Valve Index
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel i5-8400 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR: Only supports Valve Index

short_description: Are you ready to perform for us? Grab your guns, Dive into our dungeon, and Endure the Desires of the Audience. Will you accept their challenges? Or Defy them, and risk their rage? Never forget: "Entertainment is Everything"
